body:
I have fixed the following issues:
1 error found in build log:
     93        ADIOS1: OFF
     94        ADIOS2: ON
     95        PYTHON: OFF
     96
     97    -- Checking for module 'fftw3'
     98    --   Package 'fftw3', required by 'virtual:world', not found
     99    CMake Error at ./spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/cmake-3.19.5-mm45hmbipwxwdaveedyqldluqptzeq3z/share/cmake-3.19/Modules/FindPkgConfig.cmake:553 (message):
     100     A required package was not found
     101   Call Stack (most recent call first):
     102     /.spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/cmake-3.19.5-mm45hmbipwxwdaveedyqldluqptzeq3z/share/cmake-3.19/Modules/FindPkgConfig.cmake:741 (_pkg_check_modules_internal)
     103     CMakeLists.txt:118 (pkg_check_modules)

I confirmed with the spack info command that the parameters that can be specified for compute are incorrect.
title: warpx: Fix fftw depend
